messages.content: As a Guardian columnist... choose hope.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fought against the privatisation of the NHS
Helped to secure legislation to allow public franchises for buses to improve public transport.
Opposed Brexit at every opportunity, doing right by his constituents.

mentions.candidate: Daniel Zeichner has shown... that Daniel will never prop up a Tory Government.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Theresa May's identikit candidates... Remember Kathy Mohan telling?... Tim Farron on gay rights, abortion and bombing Syria.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Say no to Tim Farronâ€™s illiberal Liberals and choose hope.

issues.governance: Independent-minded... rebelled over tax credits only a few weeks after being elected
issues.health: Fought against the privatisation of the NHS

leaflet.personalStatement: It strikes me Daniel has done the decent thing. In fact, he's done what his constituents wanted. He stood up for your values and stuck by his principles at every turn.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fought against the privatisation of the NHS... Helped to secure legislation for public buses... Opposed Brexit.

endorsements.endorsement: I urge you to stick with Daniel too. Please lend him your support. In his two years as your MP he has proven to be the independent voice that Cambridge needs.

quotes.text: As a Guardian columnist...(omitted for brevity)...you to stick with Daniel too.

images.caption: A message from Owen Jones to Cambridge

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains a personal message and endorsement from Owen Jones, providing support for candidate Daniel Zeichner. It critiques opponents and calls for voters to align with Zeichner's views and actions during his tenure as MP.
